title: 2013 Champs Need NEW SKINS!
body:
Ok I know we all love the Season 1-2 Champs and all but Im probably not the only fan/player in the community to notice we are giving way too much love and focus on the look and personification of certain champs. Basically, we need to give our recently newbie champs like {{champion:266}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:238}} and the abandoned ones like {{champion:121}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:16}} some new skins. Now for Ideas Id suggest Riot to seriously search up Champs on Deviantart.com or Flikr.com to check out some sick Skin ideas their players have for these champs! 
What do you guys think? 
These champs may not be "The Face Of LoL" but they're REALLY underrated and underestimated champs... GIVE THEM SOME LOVE AND SKINS!

replies.body:
{{champion:266}}: he just came out 5 champs ago (i think) give him more time

{{champion:154}}: Mixed Fruit Zac, it needs to happen.

{{champion:133}}: Could use one, not high priority though

{{champion:127}}: *cough* Blade queen *cough*

{{champion:236}}: Aatrox needs one first

{{champion:222}}: She just came out 6 months ago really?

{{champion:238}}: SKT ZED

{{champion:121}}: Yeah he needs one

{{champion:83}}: Probably after he gets reworked. I heard they plan on doing that this year

{{champion:39}}: Too OP to get a skin. Needs more nerfs.
 
{{champion:69}}: She got jade fang in the beginning of 2013
 
{{champion:134}}: Atlantean, Have you even played recently?

{{champion:6}}: Needs his rework first prob.

{{champion:8}}: F*ck vlad

{{champion:16}}: F*ck her too
Lol <3
I agree with all of that except Quinn. Super high priority there. Think of the possibilities!
how about night hunter rengar?
the night hunter skin really isn't that good in my opinion
de-pizza!?!?!?!? D:
*cough* {{champion:111}} *cough*... no one mentions this poor guy anymore :(
What about LB and Quinn? :C
{{champion:134}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:8}}  already has new or legendery skins like BL vlad or jade fang cassiopeia
I will be honest.... with the current playability of {{champion:7}}  I am surprised she does not have more skins inbound....

Lissandra has a skin planned soon. Syndra just got a new skin, so did zed. Personally, I think that{{champion:48}} needs a new skin. He has two that are available, and with his recent playtime in competetive play, I'd love to see a new troll skin.

He also has the classic skin for cool kids.
TBH, Classic Trundle is better than any of his other skins.
Zed got a new skin this week o.O

Soraka got a new skin not too long ago and Syndra just got a new one.
{{champion:16}} {{champion:134}} Should not be on your list. lol
{{champion:222}} only has mafia jinx..... i want to buy another one!
she is newbie ,she will get skin after half or 1 year
EARLYER PLEASE. EVERYONE LIKES JINX (exept vi and cait)

@Fappersanon I see your Point I still Say that{{champion:266}} Deserves A Much better skin. I also think that Riot should come out with a New line of champion skins-Examples like Battlecast skins Or The Vandal Skins That would be a line of skins I think Champions with one or two Skins Should Be put into Such as Flame Fire Jinx And have her Hair Be Fire and Her Missile to be a Giant Fireball you know Something Creative.Something like Void {{champion:266}} or Zombie {{champion:35}} I think skin that relates to other previous skins(Im Refering to Void {{champion:56}} and Zombie {{champion:63}} as the Previous Skins.)
What about {{champion:267}} she only has 2 skins. she was released in late 2012 i think.

{{champion:90}} Really Needs a New skin I like his Shadow Prince skin,but I hate how it has no Change in spell colors or Voidling Colors I think They could be black or Gold To represent the Shadow Prince Aspect. I also think that {{champion:266}} Also Really Needs a new skin the Justicar skin Only Has its Few Cool Changes {{champion:266}} has so Much more Potential than that I would Recommend A More of Fire Demon skin or a Lightning Skin Similar to Zeds Skin,But thats just My Opinion
same for {{champion:222}}

Plads I so agree with you on {{champion:266}}. Not favoritism him or anything but hes my main. I honestly suggest a dark themed skin for Aatrox. Void Aatrox sounds cool, Ive seen a Headhunter Aatrox but I dont know if thats too much design. Or a black DarkBlade Aatrox. 
Im just throwing AA here because he is one of the top 5 most underrated and under spoken about champs in the League. When he came out last year he wasn't popular after the 2nd week once they nerffed him. He just because an extra champ to buy. but using him the right way with the right build {{champion:266}} can be extremely OP and a amazing AD Health Tank carry! ... like I said give him and most of the just recently new champs some attention.
Okay honestly any champ with one skin BAM! needs a new skin and yorick pls give him a legendary!
Agreed, we need more skins than champ releases

You know riot, they will eventually get around to it. like the new lissandra skin. but yeah i do believe there team that designs skins needs to get pushed, they are severely lacking on many champions. *cough* {{champion:39}} *cough* {{champion:83}}. Rito pleb.
Give{{champion:76}} a nicer skin plz. Not the old ugly ones.
AGREED!
just changing the splash art on leopard nidalee would be good
more skins like head hunter ples
At least one of the champions mentioned in this post has a new skin in the works. Also didn't we just release Atlantean Syndra?

Does that include the Lissandra skin in the PBE? Kha'zix seems like he's overdue considering all of the champions released around him up to Thresh (including Nami now, apparently, with the splash art just posted on the PBE) already have at least 2 skins apiece.
I'm really hoping {{champion:267}} gets a new skin soon. It's been nearly a year and a half, i think it's time!
It's happening. Check the red tracker.
yep

Make {{champion:114}} Skin form Asuna sword art online!
And I will buy it.

Champion release order from Syndra to current:

{{champion:134}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:161}} 


Given the appearance of Riot going in relative order of champion releases... The only outliers are Kha'Zix being overdue, Lissandra/Vi were early and Elise/Thresh have Limited Edition ones that cannot be had (though unfortunately, likely means we won't be able to buy a skin for them any time soon.)

Based on that order... The list of new champions you say need love are all within the 8 most recent champions released. Their skins are likely coming. (Not counting Zed who just had a skin.)


Of your "abandoned" heroes:

{{champion:121}} Still new, but he's been skipped for a second skin

{{champion:6}} {{champion:83}} Due for reworks. When Riot knows they will do a visual rework, they won't make a new skin because that doubles the time spent on that skin. They'll wait until the rework is released.

{{champion:134}} JUST had a skin released

{{champion:69}}{{champion:16}}  Last skin released in 2013

{{champion:39}} {{champion:8}} I honestly don't know if there's a reason for these. Irelia's last skin was in 2012, Vlad's in 2011.

Because I feel like making a list of champions who have NOT had any new skin since I started playing (June 2012) for a better idea of potentially "abandoned" champions:

{{champion:84}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:26}} 

Notes:

Karma and Trundle did get a traditional skin

Evelynn, Karthus, Kassadin, Poppy, Sion, Taric, Urgot, Warwick, Yorick and *maybe* Zilean are due for a VU

Heimerdinger and Twitch did recently get a VU, so I'm hoping for a skin soon
{{champion:121}} NEEDS A NEW SKIN BUT WHAT OH MAYBE WE COULD MAKE A NIGHT HUNTER SKIN FOR HIM!!!
sry all caps

Well I agree with some, but most of the champions, just no. For starters, lissandra is getting a new skin very very soon, it's called blade queen or something to that affect. Zed got a new skin yesterday, as did syndra a few days ago, jinx and lucian are still fairly new, soraka and cass have both gotten skins in 2013, and you won't see any skins for yorick, urgot, and irelia anytime soon because they won't release a skin for a champion until after their rework.

Honestly of the champions who need skins, are, Trundle by far, malzahar, rammus,heimer,twitch,leblanc, and many other older champions. Long story short, take care of the older champions before you cater to the new.
I don't care if jinx is new she been around (not released but around) since pool party. Shes in the orinal pool party pic

yeah basicly. Some champs they have way too many skins like {{champion:96}} and {{champion:17}} 
But other champs have so much skins possabiltils.(Sorry for spelling) Hello? {{champion:222}}
Karma is in the most dire need of a new skin. Have you seen her skins? I wont play her because she has no good skins. D:
she a good champ. she just needs better skins
